ygData.subject: Re: No  Trouble in the lab
ygData.msgSnippet: So you re trying to say that we re freaks? Razor Claw liked that even less than being a rogue, the rogues were hunted by the factions, the freaks were hunted

"So you're trying to say that we're freaks?" Razor Claw liked that 
even less than being a rogue, the rogues were hunted by the factions, 
the freaks were hunted by everybody. "Predacons were designed to 
conquer, Maximals were designed to explore, why were we created?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> "Well, we are something very different from normal bots. We are, 
> well, I guess you could call us the perfect balance between Bot and 
> animal. We are the start of a new breed, You, myself and Lunarpine. 
> We are the first." She smiled. "We are our own faction you could 
say."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Razor Claw looked at his shoulder, "It seems to be repairing 
> nicely." 
> > He looked out at Ice's robot mode, he hadn't gotten a good view 
of 
> it 
> > before. "What are we?" he asked not knowing the full answer. If 
he 
> > wasn't a maximal or predacon he was a rogue, and he knew how 
rogues 
> > were treated by the other factions.
> > 
> > Lunarpine looked at Ice from behind, memorizing every hair and 
> > feather on her body. The new bot seemed to look at her with 
> interest. 
> > He didn't like that.
> >
